resources.string:
Show 40 items:
 - 20 items from the first period request:
 https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/mostviewed/all-sections/30.json?api-key=d4q1Mr1Or4Am6rhoHuvtpkqE2gDp211P
 - 20 items from the second period request:
 https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/mostviewed/all-sections/1.json?api-key=d4q1Mr1Or4Am6rhoHuvtpkqE2gDp211P
 And return them in one list together after getting the response from both with deffered coroutines and concate them in one list together as required.
